title: header.css
content: /*CSS - Header BookYourHotel.org/ /* **********HEADER ALLE PAGINA'S ********** #headerfirststart { background-image: url(background.jpg); background-repeat:repeat; width: 20px; height: 91px; float:left; margin: 2px 0 0 3px; _margin: 2px 0 0 2px; } #headerstart { background-image: url(globe2.jpg); width: 137px; height: 91px; float: left; margin: 2px 0 0 0; } #headerend { background-image: url(worldmap.jpg); background-repeat: no-repeat; float: left; width: 446px; height: 91px; margin: 2px 0 0 0; } #headermiddle { background-image: url(background.jpg); background-repeat:repeat; width:373px; height: 91px; float:left; margin: 2px 0 0 0; } #headertext h1 a, #headertext h1 a:hover{ color: #fff; font-family: Century Gothic, Arial, "Times New Roman", Verdana, "Franklin Gothic Book", Times, serif; font-size: 30px; font-weight: lighter; text-decoration: none; } #headertext h1{ position: absolute; top: -8px; #top: 14px; _top: 14px; left: 60px; z-index: 18; } #headertext h2{ position: absolute; top: -10px; #top: 15px; _top: 15px; left: 63px; font-size: 30px; font-weight: lighter; color: #222; font-family: Century Gothic, Arial, "Times New Roman", Verdana, "Franklin Gothic Book", Times, serif; z-index: 17; } #headertext h3{ position: absolute; font-family: Century Gothic, Arial, "Times New Roman", Verdana, "Franklin Gothic Book", Times, serif; top: 26px; #top: 46px; _top: 46px; left:140px; font-size: 19px; z-index: 18; _width: 300px; } #headertext h3 a, #headertext h3 a:hover{ /*color: #FAE8C7;*/ color: #FBD17B; font-size: 17px; letter-spacing: 1px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 100; } #headbar{ float: right; margin: 1px 5px 0 0; } #headbar ul{ margin: 0px 5px 0 34px; padding: 0; } #headbar ul li{ display: inline; } #headbar ul li a img{ border: 0; } #callus{ background-image: url(callus.jpg); background-repeat:no-repeat; opacity: 0.8; width: 153px; height: 49px; margin: 23px 0 0 287px; #margin: -2px 0 0 287px; _margin: -4px 0 0 287px; #filter: alpha(opacity=80); } #callus img{ margin: 2px 6px 0 25px; float: left; #margin: 3px 6px 0 25px; } .call{ font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; color: #FFFFFF; float:left; margin: 4px 0px 0 5px; #margin: 5px 0px 0 5px; } .phonenumber{ font-size: 11px; color: #FFFFFF; text-align:center; padding: 4px 0 0 0; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 0px; clear: both; #margin-top: 2px; } #homebar{ float: right; margin-right: 5px; _margin-right: 3px; margin-top: 5px; _margin-top: 0px; } #homebarmenu{ } #lefthomebarmenu{ background-image: url(homecorner2.png); _background-image: url(homecorner2ie6.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; height: 27px; width: 24px; float: left; margin-top: -7px; _margin-top: 0px; opacity: 0.7; #filter: alpha(opacity=70); } #middlehomebarmenu{ background-image: url(homemiddle.jpg); background-repeat:repeat; float: left; height: 27px; margin-top: -7px; _margin-top: 0px; opacity: 0.7; #filter: alpha(opacity=70); } #righthomebarmenu{ background-image: url(homelast.jpg); background-repeat:no-repeat; height: 27px; width: 4px; float: left; margin-top: -7px; _margin-top: 0px; opacity: 0.7; #filter: alpha(opacity=70); } #homebar ul{ padding: 0; margin: 0; margin-top: -2px; #margin-top: -1px; } #homebar ul li{ margin: 0 15px 0 0; display: inline; color: #FFF; } #homebar ul li a{ color:#FFF; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; } #homebar ul li a:hover{ color: #FFB76F; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; } #headbar_cur{ float: right; margin: 4px 10px 0 0; padding: 0; #padding: 1px 0 0 0; font-size: 11px; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; #margin: 0px 10px 0 0; #margin: 0px 10px -16px 0; } #headbar_cur select{ font-size: 11px; vertical-align: middle; #vertical-align: middle; margin: 0px 0 0 5px; #margin: 1px 0 0 5px; _margin: 1px 0 0 5px; } #breadcrumb{ float: left; margin-left: 10px; font-size: 10px; color: #0B405C; } #breadcrumb p{ margin: 5px 10px 0 0; #margin: 5px 10px 0 0; font-size: 11px; } #breadcrumb a{ color: #0B405C; text-decoration: none; font-size: 11px; } #breadcrumb a:hover{ font-size: 11px; color: #2E759B; text-decoration: underline; } #totalheader{ float: left; } #breadcrumbborder{ float: left; background-image: url(headerbottom.jpg); background-repeat:repeat; width: 977px; height: 25px; margin: 2px 0 0 3px; _margin: 2px 0 0 2px; } /********* END HEADER **********
